"The Scientist" by Coldplay: This introspective and emotional song represents the moments of reflection and self-discovery that come with growing up and finding one's path.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This classic disco hit symbolizes resilience and perseverance, reminding us that no matter what challenges life throws our way, we can overcome and thrive.
"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen: This iconic and theatrical song represents the unpredictable and ever-changing nature of life, showcasing the power of creativity and self-expression.
"My Way" by Frank Sinatra: This timeless crooner classic embodies the importance of staying true to oneself and forging one's own path in life, regardless of what others may think.
"We Are the Champions" by Queen: This triumphant anthem captures the sense of achievement and pride that comes from overcoming obstacles and reaching our goals.
